name: A Luminous Adventure
description:
The world is slowly being eaten by darkness. You then decide to go on a journey to restore light back into the world.

Player must collect light particles to slowly brighten the world around them. There will be enemies that are patrolling, sneak around them and don't get caught. If you are caught, you must kill them or they might steal all the light particles. But killing comes at a cost, the only way to kill them is using light, which consumes the light source around you. Collect enough particles and lighten the world once again!
